results.title: Autonomic and cellular mechanisms mediating detrimental cardiac effects of status epilepticus.
results.text_hl: Both were prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment during @DISEASE_Seizures @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@.
